Resources

If you’re keen to find more code examples to learn from, search for “#TidyTuesday” and “#RStats” on Twitter.

Not on Twitter but keen to try it out? The free book Twitter for R programmers will get you started.

Want to learn R? Here’s some free resources to get you started - one book and one video course.

Want even more R? Check out the collection of over 250 free books covering a wide variety of fields and topics at Big Book of R.

Vids by David Robinson. Timestamps & rich content by Alex Cookson and Eric Fletcher. Website by Oscar Baruffa, sign up to my newsletter for R, data and careers
